data.name: Download_Failure
data.value: An error occured when trying to download this item. Try disabling any VPNs or firewalls.
data.comment: Error message that gets displayed to the user whenever a download fails

data.name: Download_FailureCritical
data.value: An error occured when trying to download this item. Try disabling any VPNs or firewalls. Installation cannot continue.
data.comment: Error message that gets displayed to the user whenever a download fails, and the module is a critical component, meaning the installation CANNOT continue.

data.name: InstallDestination_AmethystInstallLocationFootnote
data.value: Only Amethyst will be installed to this folder. Other items will install to their default locations.

data.name: InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat
data.comment: {0} gets replaced with the disk label (eg "Local Disk") and {1} gets replaced with the drive letter {eg "C:" )

data.name: InstallDestination_InvalidPathDescription
data.value: The path you've entered is invalid. Please enter a valid path to continue.

data.name: InstallDestination_PathPlaceholder
data.value: Please select a valid install folder

data.name: InstallDestination_StorageFormatFree
data.comment: {0} is required (it's going to get replaced with 420GB for example)

data.name: InstallError_CloudPC
data.value: Cloud PC detected. Amethyst does not support networked environments.
data.comment: The message shown to a user when they are running a Cloud PC solution such as Shadow or Plutosphere

data.name: InstallError_SteamVRNotFound
data.value: Couldn't find SteamVR! Is it installed, and have you run it at least once?
data.comment: The message shown to a user when the installer fails to locate SteamVR, usually because it's not installed, or has not been run at least once.

data.name: InstallError_WindowsVersionIsOld
data.value: Windows version is too old to run Amethyst. Please update your copy of Windows from Settings to use Amethyst.
data.comment: The message shown to a user when they have an old version of Windows that is not supported by Amethyst

data.name: InstallProhibited_Title
data.comment: The name of the dialog window shown to the user if they are unable to install Amethyst on their system. This dialog is shown instead of the main installer window.

data.name: Logs_DirectoryIsLocatedHere
data.value: The log file is stored here:

data.name: Sidebar_Task_Welcome
data.comment: Sidebar tasks are the list of "stages" of the installer on the left hand side, with checkmarks

data.name: Speedrunner_Description
data.value:
Whoa there! Are you trying to get the world record on Amethyst Installer Any% ?
Be careful where you click!
data.comment: this dialog gets shown when the user spams through the installer

data.name: Speedrunner_Title
data.comment: this dialog gets shown when the user spams through the installer

data.name: SystemRequirement_Description_Playspace_Good
data.value: Your VR play area is large enough for tracking. {0}m by {1}m
data.comment: Shown if the playspace is large enough. {0} and {1} get replaces with the bounds along the X and Y axis respectively

data.name: SystemRequirement_Description_Playspace_Small
data.value: The size of your VR play area could cause issues with tracking. [Refer to the documentation for physical space requirements.] {0}m by {1}m
data.comment: Shown if the playspace is not large enough. {0} and {1} get replaces with the bounds along the X and Y axis respectively. Everything in between [] will turn into a hyperlink leading to the relevant documentation page.

data.name: SystemRequirement_Description_Playspace_Unknown
data.value: Your play area size could not be detected. [Refer to the documentation for physical space requirements.]
data.comment: Shown if the playspace size couldn't be determined. Everything in between [] will turn into a hyperlink leading to the relevant documentation page.

data.name: SystemRequirement_Description_Storage
data.value: {0} of disk space based on the components selected.
data.comment: {0} gets replaced with the storage string (eg "400MB")

data.name: SystemRequirement_Description_UsbControllers
data.comment: {0} gets replaced with the number of USB controllers (eg "2"), {1} gets replaced with the list of USB controllers (eg "Intel 3.1, Renesas 720201/720202")

data.name: SystemRequirement_Description_UsbControllers_One
data.comment: {0} gets replaced with the number of USB controllers (eg "2"), {1} gets replaced with the list of USB controllers (eg "Intel 3.1, Renesas 720201/720202")

data.name: SystemRequirement_Footnote_StageTracking_VirtualDesktop
data.value: We recommend [enabling stage tracking] inside the Quest portion of Virtual Desktop to avoid needing to recalibrate Amethyst at the start of each VR session.
data.comment: The first string of text surrounded by []s will get turned into the hyperlink

data.name: Welcome_OptIn
data.value: Opt in to anonymous analytics and crash reports.

data.name: Welcome_PrivacyPolicy
data.comment: The text for the link

data.name: Welcome_ReadPrivacyPolicy
data.value: Read our %s% to see what we send.
data.comment: %s% gets replaced with the link
